post.author: Venus6001
post.body:
Hey All,

I'm looking for a copy of Spogs Q3map explanation. It seems there was only ever one link to it. This is the old link which is now dead.

http://hosted.planetquake.gamespy.com/s ... nical.html

So I was wondering if anyone here has kept a copy of it? If so, could you post either a copy of it here, or a link to the file, or email it to me at: neon3003@optusnet.com.au

Yes I know this is D3 lol but there'd be alot of old Q3 mappers here too who might have a copy of it.

I'd really appreciate it.

Venus
